cases.title: Radiology Expert Witness Testimony Confirms No Child Abuse
cases.description: The testimony of a radiology expert witness and endocrinology expert witness confirm that a child under eighteen years of age was not abused.

cases.title: Law Enforcement Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Fourth Amendment Case
cases.description: The court allowed an law enforcement expert witness to testify regarding an investigation into mortgage fraud, but could not opine on any legal conclusions.

cases.title: The Testimony of Chemistry Expert Witness Should Have Been Excluded in DUI Case
cases.description: It was improper to admit the testimony of a chemistry expert regarding "retrograde extrapolation."  However, the court found that the lower court's ruling did not prejudice the defendant.
